sentences.sContent: They've hopped to Hawaii for holidays.
sentences.sCn: 他们已坐飞机到夏威夷度假去了。

sentences.sContent: Every summer we surf the beach of Hawaii.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every summer we surf the beach of Hawaii.
sentences.sCn: 每年夏天我们都到夏威夷的海滨去冲浪。

sentences.sContent: They agreed on Hawaii for this summer holiday.
sentences.sContent_eng: They agreed on Hawaii for this summer holiday.
sentences.sCn: 他们一致决定今年暑假去夏威夷。
